entry.title: New release for Librum: v.0.12.2
entry.content:
Uff... A lot of work was done and Librum just got a lot better! From big bug fixes over great improvements to whole new features that were introduced with this release.

Down below is a list of changes :rocket:! (Click here to visit the blog post on this release)

Features: - Added Tools Page - Merge - Extract - Image to PDF - Added alerts to improve feedback - Added occasional feedback popup - Reworked the selection menu to look more modern

Improvements: - Improved loading animation across the application and added loading animation to more places to improve feedback - Improved 'Save To Files' to correctly use the title and file extension as destination name - Improved feedback when downloading a book by adding a loading animation - Remember the folder you were in after leaving the home page and restore it correctly

Translations: - Added Bengali translation

Fixes: - Fixed bug causing being unable to download and read books other than pdf and epub from the cloud - Fixed bug causing crash and locally uninstalling book when losing internet connection while reading - Fixed crash caused by uninstalling or deleting a book while its downloading - Fixed bug causing unselected books in multi-select mode to still be logically selected and operated upon - Fixed book title in external book mode not being displayed - Fixed zooming not working in external book mode - Fixed file dialog issues - Fixed issues with incorrect current page count in books with different page heights - Fixed issues with the zoom combobox on the reading page

If you would like to support the development of Librum, please visit https://librumreader.com/contribute or consider becoming a Github Sponsor :heart:
